page.title: 04Southern Water Authority
page.content: The Southern Water Authority only look after the low lying areas of Britain and the county councils supervise the rest of the coast. Shoreham is lucky as it has a lot of shingle and this is a good protector as it breaks the force of the sea. The Shoreham coast at the moment is vulnerable because the shingle is not a safe foundation for the houses along the beach. Home life is being threatened because of the lack of funds for sea defences.Now the sea is trying to take back it's own land and the developed land is in great danger.The Government as yet have not given the funds for protection.
